Name: Monfer-Crest
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Chimchar, Monferno, and Infernape.  Swap a Monfer-Hair and a Monfer-Fang for a Monfer-Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
